institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 22 (Support for Learning Network Activities)
contents: Article 22 (Support for Learning Network Activities) ① The Chairman may support learning network activities for learning leaders, etc. in order to share human and material know-how between supporting companies. ② The head of the affiliated organization must actively strive to form a council for supported and terminated companies in each region. If there are not enough companies in the jurisdiction, the head of the affiliated organization may proceed with other affiliated organizations. ③ Benchmarking of best practices among supported companies and learning network activities In order to improve the content, we can support the contents of each item, 1. Consulting for learning organization by region and year, 2. Competition for learning leaders and learning facilitators for learning organization, 3. On-site learning at excellent companies, 4. Other council operations. required activity fee
